(OOC:  Hey KS, Thanks for bringup me and building the whole base thing.  I =
had been thinking about the Dimension of Elements and their storyline for a=
 while, and forgot my intention to have the plant command center slowly pro=
gress, I appologize for moding and seeming unfair)

::Covertax/Ringalish=E9=
/Alvatar/Dernio & Kronia::

           Now, the plant command center had gr=
own some more.  A day and about 13 hours and the plant command center would=
 reach full growth.  Dernio and Kronia were still just working away at plan=
t resources.

          Everyone was just, "chilling out", doing their "thi=
ng".  But, there was one thing they hadn't talked about......Who would be t=
he leader.

      Covertax, Alvatar and Ringalish=E9 got together to discus=
s who would be the leader.  The discussion did not last very long, not even=
 5 minutes.

          "Hey, I'm just a spy," Covertax said.

         "And=
 I'm just a fighter, I couldn't be leader," Alvatar said.

        Ringalis=
h=E9 then appointed himself leader.

        They all agreed.

       "Yes,=
 you have been managing everything so far, Ringalish=E9, so you should be l=
eader.  You'd make a good leader, and you make and excellent friend.  You a=
re the most responsible, and thoughtful person.  Yaa!!  Ringalish=E9!!!" Co=
vertax and Alvatar said, cheering.

        Ringalish=E9 just smiled, and c=
ontinued meditating.  Covertax just continued lazing around, and Alvatar wa=
s practicing his fighting skills against a fairly thick tree.  And, of cour=
se, Dernio and Kronia, were just working.
